name: Mr. Clean (bruhmomentlmao)
description:
Mr. Clean Needs Your Help!

Use fans to help navigate Mr. Clean through the corporate chain of "Mostly Fans", a fan manufacturing and distribution company with corrupt management and ulterior motives...

Controls

• A - Cycle Selection/Switch Fan

• D - Activate Selection/Fan

• Stuck?    Press A and D down for 3 seconds to access the pause screen!

Info

• If the game doesn't load properly, or zooms in at the beginning, just refresh the page once or twice!

• The game takes roughly 15-20 minutes to complete.

• Want to know what's behind the brief black screen near the end of the web version? Download the game to find out!

Deeper Lore

In a distant alternate reality, the year was 1958, and House Peters Jr was out at his local "Mostly Fans" store. He aimed to purchase a simple fan before heading home to his fiancé, but his plans were abruptly brought to a halt after an unfortunate accident involving a sabotaged fan and a puddle caused Peters Jr to slip. This accident left him paralyzed from the waist down, fueling his exigence towards getting revenge and stopping the CEO of "Mostly Fans", Dr. Dirty, from harming anymore innocent fan shoppers...

(Peters Jr discovered an ancient relic known as the "Magic Eraser" at some point between this unfortunate event and the events that unfold in this game. This relic granted him the powers that now allow him to clean anything with ease, with the media quickly dubbing him as "Mr. Clean", leaving many to speculate the exact nature of the relic itself, but that's a story for another time...)
